Class AssetOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.assets.AssetOptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssetAggregator, AssetProcessor 

    public class AssetOptions
extends Object
    Base class for AssetProcessor and AssetAggregator. Just keep state and handle aseets options.

    edgar
